message: Let's divide fairly, I get a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good in later rounds.
You should accept, it's better than what you'll get later
Okay Alice, let's stop being difficult. 50/50 is the fairest and we both lose if this fails.
Your 50/50 offer was generous, but I think I can get more
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is only going down from here. Take this deal before we both lose out!
You're right, your offers will only get worse. Mine won't
Alice, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it, but we both lose soon.
